definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Without a little utilitarian, to see white clouds dotted blue screen.
sentences.chinese: 不帶一點功利地，看白雲點綴藍幕。

sentences.english: Not one person in my squad got out without a bullet round.
sentences.chinese: 我的小隊中沒有人出去身上不帶彈孔回來的。

sentences.english: While a pair of hollow jacks without electrodes are correspondingly and additionally arranged on the lamp base.
sentences.chinese: 而在管座上對應地增設了一對不帶電極的空心插孔。

sentences.english: Do you need a furnished or unfurnished apartment?
sentences.chinese: 你需要帶傢俱還是不帶傢俱的公寓？

sentences.english: Hillary was a good choice, she can tell a lie without even blinking.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里是一個不錯的選擇，丫簡直說謊不帶眨眼的。

sentences.english: I will be fair and impartial when recommending both rewards and punishment.
sentences.chinese: 在實行獎勵與懲罰時我將保持公正不帶偏見。

sentences.english: Black coffee is calorie-free and rich in antioxidants.
sentences.chinese: 黑咖啡幾乎不帶熱量並富含抗氧化劑。

sentences.english: They showed respondents three unlabeled pie charts.
sentences.chinese: 他們向被調查者出示了三張不帶標籤的餅狀圖。

sentences.english: If you define an attribute without a prefix, then it does not have a namespace.
sentences.chinese: 如果您定義一個不帶前綴的屬性，則它沒有名稱空間。

sentences.english: The Keyless Locking Mailbox turns the tables on mail thieves.
sentences.chinese: 不帶鑰匙的郵箱鎖改善了郵件失竊的情況。

sentences.english: This is emulated on compilers without rvalue references.
sentences.chinese: 在不帶右值引用的編譯器上的模擬。

sentences.english: This figure shows the open die forming press without its safety equipment.
sentences.chinese: 下圖爲不帶安全裝置的自由鍛壓機。

sentences.english: Black means black without a trace of brindle.
sentences.chinese: 黑色是指黑色不帶虎斑。

sentences.english: High quality non-magnetic extra-thick frosted stainless steel casing, elegant and durable.
sentences.chinese: 優質不帶磁加厚磨砂不鏽鋼外殼，典雅耐用。

sentences.english: Side mount, self closing, without flange.
sentences.chinese: 側放，自動關閉，不帶輪緣。

sentences.english: Chinese studies found that testosterone without progestin inhibits sperm production.
sentences.chinese: 中國研究發現不帶孕酮的睾丸激素能抑制精子生產。

definition: A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
(slang) to target an intoxicated person for sexual assault
lit. 300 silver taels not hidden here (idiom); fig. to reveal what one intends to hide
pinyin: ci3 di4 wu2 yin2 san1 bai3 liang3

definition: lit. Lord Ye's passion for dragons (idiom)/fig. to pretend to be fond of sth while actually fearing it/ostensible fondness of sth one really fears
